title: Modern Cyrillic: Type Design Competion by ParaType
content:
Submitted by [paul d hunt](http://web.archive.org/web/20100103131230/http:/typophile.com/user/7006 "View user profile.") : 11.Jun.2009 11.46am 

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100103131230im_/http:/typophile.com/files/covermennayakirillitsa061109pdh_4060.png)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100103131230im_/http:/typophile.com/files/ModernCyrillic061109pdh_6165.png)

The competition is held by [ParaType](http://web.archive.org/web/20100103131230/http:/typophile.com/wiki/ParaType) with support by the Federal Agency for Press and Mass Communications of Russia. It’s dedicated to the Tercentenary of Russian [Civil Type](http://web.archive.org/web/20100103131230/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Civil%252BType) — Peter the Great’s historic reform of Russian typography (1708–1710).

[Cyrillic](http://web.archive.org/web/20100103131230/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Cyrillic) typeface projects and completed typefaces created and/or released after January 1, 2006 are eligible.

**[Русская версия](http://web.archive.org/web/20100103131230/http:/www.paratype.ru/k2009)**

[Press-release in PDF](http://web.archive.org/web/20100103131230/http:/www.paratype.com/k2009/Press_Release_eng.pdf)

[Entry form in text format](http://web.archive.org/web/20100103131230/http:/www.paratype.com/k2009/Entry_Form_eng_f.txt)

There will be online registration with upload service later on the site.

For further information, please contact: [k2009@paratype.com](mailto:k2009@paratype.com)

**The Organizing Committee**  
Olga Umpeleva — Secretary  
Sergei Bobryshev  
Emil Yakupov

ParaType, K2009  
47 Nakhimovsky Prospekt, 19th floor  
117418, Moscow, Russian Federation
